data.text:
@gillianoberholzer 

The archived data has been completed thus far.
When i get time I will go update the 71 Capturing records using the "Case Editor" featue in the CourtWorks system which could of been used in April already.

If i do it manually then i must run all the background processes manually as well

If i do it via the Case Editor then both side are mapped together via the background process built with the Case Editor. Then i only do the manual task once.
